text: Ezɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Elisa, kamaghɨn oraki, atrivim navir osɨmtɨzim ikia, uan korotiam abɨki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Elisa kamaghɨn atrivim bagha akam amaga ghaze, “Nɨ manmaghsua navim osemegha uan korotiam abɨki? Nɨ gumazir kam amadaghtɨ a na bagh izɨ, eghtɨ kɨ kamaghɨn an akaghtɨ a fogh suam, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam guizbangɨra Israelɨn iti.”
